column3: 2015 james e. truman passed away sunday. funeral services are scheduled for friday
column5: 2015 at 12:00 p. m. from krueger family funeral home. deacon darrell smerz will officiate. burial will follow in calvary cemetery. the family will receive friends at the krueger family funeral home from 10:00 a. m. until the time of services at noon. military rites will be held at the gravesite. a complete obituary will be available monday. upcoming events. visitationjun 26. 10:00 am - 12:00 pm krueger family funeral home101 north second street. tomahawk
